title: Apple Watch gets a new name, new CPU and a smaller price tag | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Apple watch series1]()**Apple has just announced the Apple Watch Series 2, but it hasn’t abandonedthe original[Apple Watch](https://www.trustedreviews.com/apple-watch-review).**Instead of being relegated to the past, the first-generation Apple Watch willremain on sale, repositioned as the junior model in the new Apple Watch range.It’s getting a new name, too: Apple Watch Series 1.It’s also receiving an upgrade, and will feature the same dual-core processoras the Apple Watch Series 2, which will make it 50% faster. Sadly, the Series1 won’t have the waterproofing capabilities of the Series 2, so you won’t beable to take it swimming.**Related:[Apple Watch 2: 7 things you need to know rightnow](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/apple-watch-2-release-date-rumours-price-news-battery-life)**The Apple Watch Series 1 has a lower price tag of £269/$269. Pre-orders beginon Friday 9 September.
